name: Spacious 2 Bed/Bath Apt Nearby MGH,MIT,Harvard,W/D
neighborhood_overview:
In the West End Neighborhood you will find plenty of parks, recreation, shops, restaurants, groceries… all right next door.

Popular Spots Include
J. Pace and Sons (Deli Market, 2 min walking located at the park behind 4 Emerson Place Buiding)

Whole Food Super Market (All Organic Super Market, 7 min walking at Charles River Plaza)

Charles Street ( Famous antique street filled with shops, restaurants and more, 12 min walking)

Cambridge Side Galleria Mall (Famous Shopping Mall located across the bridge, 17 min walking)

Boston Public Market ( Large Farmers Market with plenty of food stands and other fresh produce, 15 min walking)

Boston’s World Class Hospitals ( Massachusetts General Hospital located right across the street leads in a wide range of medical fields, you will find nothing but the best treatment in the world at MGH, other World Class Harvard hospitals accessible by free Shuttle Bus include Boston Childrens
description:
Large 2 Bedroom/ 2 Bathroom in cozy neighborhood complex located right across from Mass General Hospital and Charles River Park in Quite Safe West End Neighborhood. Walking distance to nearby shops, restaurants, groceries, mall, science museum, train station, subway... Great for families and big groups alike. Nearby MIT, Harvard and other universities.

Safe and Quite Neighborhood, Building is at 4 Emerson Place, Boston Ma 02114

Approx 1300 sqft

The space
Nice comfortable space with large rooms, washer/dryer in suite, the building has a lot of amenities to offer with a 24 hour concierge, gym, lounge, tv room...
